p: All tested A(H1N1)pdm09 viruses (n = 4) were efficiently recognised by all post-infection ferret antisera which included antisera raised against the reference virus belonging to the genetic group 6B (A/South Africa/3626/2013) and the vaccine virus (A/California/7/2009) recommended for the Southern and Northern Hemispheres for 2016 and 2016/2017. The exception was that the antiserum raised against A/Christchurch/16/2010 recognised only one Mozambican isolate at a titre within 4-fold of the homologous titre ( Table 2).
